conbody.p: You can use the Eucalyptus LDAP/AD integration to synchronize existing LDAP/AD user and group information with Eucalyptus. The integration lets you:

ul.li: Use existing LDAP/AD user/group to manage Eucalyptus identities
Access specific LDAP/AD user information from Eucalyptus
Use existing LDAP/AD to authenticate users to login to Eucalyptus Dashboard

conbody.p: The following are still managed only within Eucalyptus and can’t be synchronized from LDAP/AD:

ul.li: User credentials, including access keys and X509 certificates
EIAM permissions and quotas to access Eucalyptus resources
Special Eucalyptus users, including system administrators (i.e. users in “eucalyptus” account) and every account administrator
